description.ruby-sapphire:
Makes the user’s move last,
but it never misses.
description.emerald:
Makes the user’s move last,
but it never misses.
description.firered-leafgreen:
Makes the user
attack after the
foe. In return,
it will not miss.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user allows the
foe to attack first.
In return, this throw
move is guaranteed
not to miss.
description.platinum:
The user allows the
foe to attack first.
In return, this throw
move is guaranteed
not to miss.

The user allows the
foe to attack first.
In return, this throw
move is guaranteed
not to miss.
description.black-white:
The user attacks last.
In return, this throw move is
guaranteed not to miss.

The user attacks last.
In return, this throw move is

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
